verses.verse: And <WG2532> you <WG5209> hath he quickened, who were <WG5607> <WG5752> dead <WG3498> in trespasses <WG3900> and <WG2532> sins <WG266>;

Wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> in time past <WG4218> ye walked <WG4043> <WG5656> according to <WG2596> the course <WG165> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889>, according to <WG2596> the prince <WG758> of the power <WG1849> of the air <WG109>, the spirit <WG4151> that now <WG3568> worketh <WG1754> <WG5723> in <WG1722> the children <WG5207> of dis`Ovedience <WG543>:

Among <WG1722> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> we <WG2249> all <WG3956> had our conversation <WG390> <WG5648> in times past <WG4218> in <WG1722> the lusts <WG1939> of our <WG2257> flesh <WG4561>, fulfilling <WG4160> <WG5723> the desires <WG2307> of the flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> of the mind <WG1271>; and <WG2532> were <WG2258> <WG5713> by nature <WG5449> the children <WG5043> of wrath <WG3709>, even <WG2532> as <WG5613> others <WG3062>.

But <WG1161> 'Elohim <WG2316>, who is <WG5607> <WG5752> rich <WG4145> in <WG1722> mercy <WG1656>, for <WG1223> his <WG846> great <WG4183> love <WG26> wherewith <WG3739> he loved <WG25> <WG5656> us <WG2248>,

Havahn <WG2532> when we <WG2248> were <WG5607> <WG5752> dead <WG3498> in sins <WG3900>, hath quickened us together with <WG4806> <WG5656> Moshiach <WG5547>, (by grace <WG5485> ye are <WG2075> <WG5748> saved <WG4982> <WG5772>;)
And <WG2532> hath raised us up together <WG4891> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> made us sit together <WG4776> <WG5656> in <WG1722> heavenly <WG2032> places in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>:

That <WG2443> in <WG1722> the ages <WG165> to come <WG1904> <WG5740> he might shew <WG1731> <WG5672> the exceeding <WG5235> <WG5723> riches <WG4149> of his <WG846> grace <WG5485> in <WG1722> his kindness <WG5544> toward <WG1909> us <WG2248> through <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>.

For <WG1063> by grace <WG5485> are ye <WG2075> <WG5748> saved <WG4982> <WG5772> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102>; and <WG2532> that <WG5124> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> yourselves <WG5216>: it is the gift <WG1435> of 'Elohim <WG2316>:
Not <WG3756> of <WG1537> works <WG2041>, lest <WG3363> any man <WG5100> should boast <WG2744> <WG5667>.

For <WG1063> we are <WG2070> <WG5748> his <WG846> workmanship <WG4161>, created <WG2936> <WG5685> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> unto <WG1909> good <WG18> works <WG2041>, which <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath before ordained <WG4282> <WG5656> that <WG2443> we should walk <WG4043> <WG5661> in <WG1722> them <WG846>.

Wherefore <WG1352> remember <WG3421> <WG5720>, that <WG3754> ye <WG5210> being in time past <WG4218> goyim <WG1484> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>, who <WG3588> are called <WG3004> <WG5746> Unb'ritmilah <WG203> by <WG5259> that which <WG3588> is called <WG3004> <WG5746> the Circumcision <WG4061> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561> made by hands <WG5499>;

That <WG3754> at <WG1722> that <WG1565> time <WG2540> ye were <WG2258> <WG5713> without <WG5565> Moshiach <WG5547>, being aliens <WG526> <WG5772> from the commonwealth <WG4174> of Yisra'EL <WG2474>, and <WG2532> strangers <WG3581> from the covenants <WG1242> of promise <WG1860>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> no <WG3361> hope <WG1680>, and <WG2532> without 'Elohim <WG112> in <WG1722> the world <WG2889>:

But <WG1161> now <WG3570> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> ye <WG5210> who <WG3588> sometimes <WG4218> were <WG5607> <WG5752> far off <WG3112> are made <WG1096> <WG5675> nigh <WG1451> by <WG1722> the blood <WG129> of Moshiach <WG5547>.

For <WG1063> he <WG846> is <WG2076> <WG5748> our <WG2257> peace <WG1515>, who <WG3588> hath made <WG4160> <WG5660> both <WG297> one <WG1520>, and <WG2532> hath broken down <WG3089> <WG5660> the middle wall <WG3320> of partition <WG5418> between us;

Having abolished <WG2673> <WG5660> in <WG1722> his <WG846> flesh <WG4561> the enmity <WG2189>, even the Torah <WG3551> of Mitzvot <WG1785> contained in <WG1722> ordinances <WG1378>; for to <WG2443> make <WG2936> <WG5661> in <WG1722> himself <WG1438> of twain <WG1417> one <WG1519> <WG1520> new <WG2537> man <WG444>, so making <WG4160> <WG5723> peace <WG1515>;

And <WG2532> that he might reconcile <WG604> <WG5661> both <WG297> unto 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> body <WG4983> by <WG1223> the execution stake <WG4716>, having slain <WG615> <WG5660> the enmity <WG2189> thereby <WG1722> <WG846>:
And <WG2532> came <WG2064> <WG5631> and preached <WG2097> <WG5668> peace <WG1515> to you <WG5213> which <WG3588> were afar off <WG3112>, and <WG2532> to them that were nigh <WG1451>.
For <WG3754> through <WG1223> him <WG846> we <WG2192> both <WG297> have <WG2192> <WG5719> access <WG4318> by <WG1722> one <WG1520> Spirit <WG4151> unto <WG4314> the Father <WG3962>.

Now <WG3767> therefore <WG686> ye are <WG2075> <WG5748> no more <WG3765> strangers <WG3581> and <WG2532> foreigners <WG3941>, but <WG235> fellowcitizens <WG4847> with the saints <WG40>, and <WG2532> of the household <WG3609> of 'Elohim <WG2316>;

And are built <WG2026> <WG5685> upon <WG1909> the foundation <WG2310> of the emissarys <WG652> and <WG2532> prophets <WG4396>, Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> himself <WG846> being <WG5607> <WG5752> the chief corner <WG204> stone;
In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> all <WG3956> the building <WG3619> fitly framed together <WG4883> <WG5746> groweth <WG837> <WG5719> unto <WG1519> an holy <WG40> temple <WG3485> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>:
In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> are builded together <WG4925> <WG5743> for <WG1519> an habitation <WG2732> of 'Elohim <WG2316> through <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151>.
